FuncDef:
The pki entity command creates a PKI entity and displays the PKI entity view.
The undo pki entity command deletes the PKI entity.
By default, no PKI entity is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of the PKI entity.
It is a string of 1 to 31 case sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you apply for a certificate, run the pki entity command to create a PKI entity.
When applying for certificates, an entity must add entity information to a certificate request file and send the file to the Certificate Authority (CA). The CA uses a piece of important information to describe an entity, and identifies the entity using a unique Distinguished Name (DN).
